content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -3.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid, while the boiler is out of fuel and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
  
### Iron plate mine at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the offshore pump and boiler are within the valid range for connecting pipes. The connection points must be aligned properly for the connection to succeed.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### General connection errors
- Check the status of the entities you are trying to connect. Ensure they are powered and have the necessary inputs to function correctly.
